name: canvas-mcp
description: MCP server for Canvas Learning Management System API

categories.name: Student Tools
categories.description: Personal academic tracking using Canvas 'self' endpoints

categories.name: Educator Tools
categories.description: Course management, grading, and analytics for instructors/TAs

categories.name: Shared Tools
categories.description: Content access tools for both students and educators

categories.name: Search Helper Tools
categories.description: Find Canvas resources by name instead of ID

categories.name: Developer Tools
categories.description: Bulk operations, code execution, and tool discovery

tools.name: get_my_upcoming_assignments
tools.description: Get your upcoming assignments across all courses

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to look ahead

tools.returns: List of assignments due within timeframe, sorted by due date
examples: What assignments do I have due this week?
Show me what's due in the next 3 days

tools.name: get_my_todo_items
tools.description: Get your Canvas TODO list
tools.returns: All items requiring attention with due dates and course info
examples: Show me my Canvas TODO list
What do I need to do?

tools.name: get_my_submission_status
tools.description: Check your submission status across assignments

parameters.name: course_identifier
parameters.description: Course code or ID to filter (optional)

tools.returns: Submitted and missing assignments, with overdue items flagged
examples: Have I submitted everything?
Show me my submission status for BADM 350

tools.name: get_my_course_grades
tools.description: View your current grades across all enrolled courses
tools.returns: Current grade and percentage for each course
examples: What are my current grades?
Show me how I'm doing in all my courses

tools.name: get_my_peer_reviews_todo
tools.description: List peer reviews you need to complete

parameters.name: course_identifier
parameters.description: Course code or ID to filter (optional)

tools.returns: Incomplete peer reviews with assignment and course info
examples: What peer reviews do I need to complete?
Show me my pending peer reviews

tools.name: list_assignments
tools.description: List all assignments for a course
tools.returns: List of assignments with IDs, names, due dates, points
examples: Show me all assignments in BADM 350
List assignments for course 12345

tools.name: get_assignment_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific assignment
tools.returns: Full assignment details including description, due date, submission types
examples: Show me details for assignment 456 in course 123

tools.name: list_submissions
tools.description: View student submissions for an assignment
tools.returns: List of submissions with student info, scores, and status
examples: Who has submitted Assignment 2?
Show me submissions for the latest assignment

tools.name: get_assignment_analytics
tools.description: Get comprehensive performance analytics for an assignment
tools.returns: Submission stats, grade distribution, completion rates
examples: Show me analytics for Assignment 3
What's the submission rate for the final project?

tools.name: create_assignment
tools.description: Create a new assignment in a course with configurable due dates, submission types, and peer reviews

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: HTML content for the assignment body

parameters.name: submission_types
parameters.description: Comma-separated: online_text_entry, online_url, online_upload, discussion_topic, none, on_paper, external_tool

parameters.name: grading_type
parameters.description: One of: points, letter_grade, pass_fail, percent, not_graded

parameters.name: published
parameters.description: Whether to publish immediately (default: false for safety)

parameters.name: assignment_group_id
parameters.description: ID of assignment group to place this in

parameters.name: automatic_peer_reviews
parameters.description: Automatically assign peer reviews when enabled

tools.returns: Created assignment details including ID and URL
examples: Create an assignment called 'Week 1 Discussion' worth 10 points, due Jan 26
Add a new essay assignment with online_text_entry submission

tools.name: get_student_analytics
tools.description: Multi-dimensional student performance analysis

parameters.name: student_id
parameters.description: Specific student ID (optional, all students if not provided)

tools.returns: Assignment completion, grade trends, risk indicators
examples: Show me student performance in BADM 350
Analyze Student_abc123's progress

tools.name: bulk_grade_submissions
tools.description: Grade multiple submissions efficiently with concurrent processing

parameters.name: grades
parameters.description: Dictionary mapping user IDs to grade info: {user_id: {rubric_assessment?, grade?, comment?}}

parameters.name: dry_run
parameters.description: If true, analyze but don't submit grades

tools.returns: Summary of grading: total, successful, failed, error details
examples: Grade these 10 students with their specific rubric scores
tools.notes: Use dry_run=true first to preview. For complex grading logic, consider execute_typescript instead.

tools.name: grade_submission_with_rubric
tools.description: Grade a single student submission using a rubric
tools.returns: Confirmation of grade submission
examples: Grade student 123's submission with 80 points on criterion _8027

tools.name: send_conversation
tools.description: Send messages to students via Canvas inbox

parameters.name: recipients
parameters.description: Array of user IDs to message

tools.returns: Confirmation of message sent
examples: Message students who haven't submitted Assignment 3

tools.name: create_announcement
tools.description: Post a course announcement
tools.returns: Confirmation of announcement posted
examples: Create an announcement about tomorrow's exam

tools.name: list_courses
tools.description: List all enrolled courses
tools.returns: List of courses with IDs, names, and codes
examples: Show me my courses
What courses am I enrolled in?

tools.name: get_course_details
tools.description: Get detailed course information including syllabus
tools.returns: Course info, syllabus, and enrollment details
examples: Show me the syllabus for BADM 350

tools.name: list_discussion_topics
tools.description: View discussion forums in a course
tools.returns: List of discussion topics with IDs and titles
examples: What discussions are active in my course?

tools.name: list_discussion_entries
tools.description: View posts in a discussion
tools.returns: List of discussion posts with authors and content
examples: Show me posts in the Week 5 discussion

tools.name: search_canvas_tools
tools.description: Search available Canvas code API operations by keyword
tools.returns: JSON with matching tools based on detail level
examples: Search for grading tools in the code API
What bulk operations are available?

tools.name: execute_typescript
tools.description: Execute TypeScript code for bulk operations with 99.7% token savings

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: TypeScript code to execute (can import from ./canvas/* modules)

tools.returns: Combined stdout/stderr from execution
examples: Grade all 90 notebook submissions using bulk grading
Send reminders to all students who haven't submitted
tools.notes: Use search_canvas_tools first to discover available imports. Best for 30+ items.

tools.name: find_assignment
tools.description: Search assignments by name (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: name_query
parameters.description: Search term to match against assignment names

tools.returns: Matching assignments with IDs, names, due dates, and points
examples: Find the 'Week 3' assignment in BADM 350
Search for assignments with 'peer review' in the name

tools.name: find_student
tools.description: Search students by name (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: name_query
parameters.description: Search term to match against student names

tools.returns: Matching students with IDs and names
examples: Find student 'Smith' in BADM 350
Search for students named 'John'

tools.name: find_discussion
tools.description: Search discussions by title (case-insensitive)

parameters.name: name_query
parameters.description: Search term to match against discussion titles

tools.returns: Matching discussions with IDs and titles
examples: Find the 'Week 5' discussion in my course
Search for discussions about 'ethics'

tools.name: get_discussion_participation_summary
tools.description: Get discussion participation breakdown (posted/replied/silent)
tools.returns: Per-student participation counts: posts, replies, and silent students
examples: Show me who participated in discussion 456
Which students haven't posted in the Week 3 discussion?

tools.name: grade_discussion_participation
tools.description: Auto-grade discussion participation based on post/reply counts

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: Assignment ID to post grades to

parameters.name: max_points
parameters.description: Maximum total points (defaults to assignment's points_possible)

parameters.name: dry_run
parameters.description: If true, preview grades without submitting

tools.returns: Grade preview or confirmation with per-student breakdown
examples: Grade discussion participation: 5 pts per post, 3 pts per reply
Preview participation grades for discussion 456
tools.notes: Use dry_run=true first to preview grades before submitting.

tools.name: export_discussion_data
tools.description: Export discussion data as CSV or summary
tools.returns: Discussion data in the requested format
examples: Export discussion 456 as CSV
Give me a summary of the Week 3 discussion

tools.name: list_quizzes
tools.description: List all quizzes in a course
tools.returns: List of quizzes with IDs, titles, types, and status
examples: Show me all quizzes in BADM 350
What quizzes are in this course?

tools.name: get_quiz_details
tools.description: Get detailed quiz information
tools.returns: Full quiz details including settings, questions, and dates
examples: Show me details for quiz 789
What are the settings for the midterm quiz?

tools.name: create_quiz
tools.description: Create a new quiz with configurable settings

parameters.name: quiz_type
parameters.description: One of: practice_quiz, assignment, graded_survey, survey

parameters.name: allowed_attempts
parameters.description: Number of attempts allowed (-1 for unlimited)

tools.returns: Created quiz details including ID and URL
examples: Create a 30-minute quiz called 'Chapter 5 Review'
Add a practice quiz with unlimited attempts

tools.name: update_quiz
tools.description: Update quiz settings
tools.returns: Updated quiz details
examples: Change quiz 789 time limit to 45 minutes
Update the midterm due date
tools.notes: Accepts same optional settings as create_quiz (title, time_limit, due_at, etc.)

tools.name: delete_quiz
tools.description: Delete a quiz
tools.returns: Confirmation of quiz deletion
examples: Delete quiz 789 from BADM 350

tools.name: publish_quiz
tools.description: Publish a quiz
tools.returns: Confirmation of quiz published
examples: Publish quiz 789

tools.name: unpublish_quiz
tools.description: Unpublish a quiz
tools.returns: Confirmation of quiz unpublished
examples: Unpublish quiz 789

tools.name: add_quiz_question
tools.description: Add a question to a quiz

parameters.name: question_type
parameters.description: One of: multiple_choice_question, true_false_question, short_answer_question, essay_question, etc.

parameters.name: answers
parameters.description: Array of answer objects with text and weight (100 for correct, 0 for incorrect)

tools.returns: Created question details including ID
examples: Add a multiple choice question worth 5 points
Add an essay question to quiz 789

tools.name: get_quiz_statistics
tools.description: Get quiz performance analytics
tools.returns: Score distribution, question-level stats, and completion rates
examples: Show me how students performed on quiz 789
What's the average score on the midterm?

tools.name: list_quiz_submissions
tools.description: View quiz submissions and scores
tools.returns: List of quiz submissions with student info, scores, and attempt details
examples: Who has taken quiz 789?
Show me quiz submissions and scores

tools.name: export_grades
tools.description: Export gradebook data as CSV or summary
tools.returns: Gradebook data in the requested format
examples: Export grades for BADM 350 as CSV
Give me a grade summary for my course

tools.name: get_assignment_groups
tools.description: List assignment groups (weighted grade categories)
tools.returns: List of assignment groups with IDs, names, weights, and rules
examples: Show me the grade categories for BADM 350
What are the assignment group weights?

tools.name: create_assignment_group
tools.description: Create a new assignment group

parameters.name: drop_lowest
parameters.description: Number of lowest scores to drop

parameters.name: drop_highest
parameters.description: Number of highest scores to drop

tools.returns: Created assignment group details including ID
examples: Create an 'Exams' group weighted at 40%
Add a 'Homework' category that drops the lowest 2 scores

tools.name: update_assignment_group
tools.description: Update assignment group settings
tools.returns: Updated assignment group details
examples: Change 'Homework' weight to 25%
Update the drop rules for the Quizzes group
tools.notes: Accepts same optional settings as create_assignment_group (name, weight, position, drop_lowest, drop_highest)

tools.name: configure_late_policy
tools.description: Configure late and missing submission policies
tools.returns: Updated late policy configuration
examples: Set a 10% per day late penalty
Configure missing submissions to receive 0 points
tools.notes: Accepts optional policy params: late_submission_deduction, late_submission_deduction_enabled, late_submission_interval, late_submission_minimum_percent, missing_submission_deduction, missing_submission_deduction_enabled

tools.name: delete_announcements
tools.description: Smart announcement deletion with filtering and dry run

parameters.name: announcement_ids
parameters.description: Array of announcement IDs to delete

parameters.name: title_contains
parameters.description: Delete announcements with title containing this string

parameters.name: title_regex
parameters.description: Delete announcements matching this regex pattern

parameters.name: older_than
parameters.description: Delete announcements older than this date (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: newer_than
parameters.description: Delete announcements newer than this date (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: dry_run
parameters.description: If true, preview what would be deleted without deleting

tools.returns: List of deleted (or would-be-deleted) announcements
examples: Delete all announcements containing 'test' (dry run first)
Remove announcements older than January 2025
tools.notes: Use dry_run=true first to preview. Supports filtering by ID, title, regex, and date range.

workflows.name: token_efficient_bulk_operation
workflows.description: Use code execution for large datasets

rate_limits.recommendation: Use max_concurrent=5 and rate_limit_delay=1000ms for bulk ops
